title: nf-core/wgcnamodules pipeline - params.contrast schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.contrast

contrast.errorMessage: The identifier that caracterice the contrast. It must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

variable.errorMessage: The identifier for the condition used as reference to get the differentially expressed genes. It must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

reference.errorMessage: The identifier for the condition used as reference to get the differentially expressed genes. It must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

target.errorMessage: The identifier for the condition where differentially expressed genes are to be measured. It must be provided and cannot contain spaces.
